description:
Adds BGM tracks from other Atelier series titles that can be used to change the in-game BGM.
A set of more than a 1,000 BGM tracks from older Atelier titles, starting with "Atelier Marie: The Alchemist of Salburg" and up to "Atelier Ryza: Ever Darkness & the Secret Hideout."

Note: In-game BGM can be changed by selecting "BGM" from the diary on the desk at the atelier.
Please visit the official website for more information.
name: Atelier Series Legacy BGM Pack
